Name: PomoFarm
About the game: do you ever have trouble focusing on tasks like working, cleaning, homework, studying, etc? then this is the game 4 u! PomoFarm is the hottest new focus timer idle game hybrid to play while you do other things things you can do while playing PomoFarm: clean the toilet fill out boring paperwork polish your shoes ace that math test impress your boss with record-breaking output probably more things features: 60 crops (some may or may not be crops) 4 friends that hang out on your farm 68 skills to unlock tomato the duck 4 seasons with their own sets of crops intense timer action cute pixel art graphics
